Desc.entry: Provides facilities for various groups and general community activities, eg dancing (line dancing and old time dancing), sport (badminton, karate and snooker) and meetings. Drama group puts on 2 plays per year (May and November), also holds panto in February.

ContactName.entry: Mr P Newton, Treasurer/Mr A Hood, Chair

category.entry: COMMUNITY CENTRES AND ASSOCIATIONS - POSTAL DISTRICT 12
